actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing the inclusion of regional economic development benefits in computing the benefit-to-cost ratio for the Alabama-Coosa River, Ala., project.

summary.text: Requires that the benefit to cost ratio for the uncompleted portions of the Alabama- Coosa River project in Alabama authorized under the River and Harbor Act of 1954 include regional economic development benefits.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the inclusion of regional economic development benefits in computing the benefit-to-cost ratio for the Alabama-Coosa River, Ala., project.
